translation: §Y基础教程§!\n基本操作\n基本玩法

original: This part of the tutorial will go through the basics of how to control the camera, game speed, controlling units, production and basic diplomacy.
translation: 该部分教程将会介绍如何控制镜头，调节游戏速度，控制单位，开展生产和进行基本外交。

original: This part of the tutorial will go through the interface to explain what everything does. It will also go through the mapmodes and teach you how trade works.
translation: 该部分教程将会介绍游戏界面以及各种功能，此外还会介绍地图模式和贸易机制。

original: This part of the tutorial will go through the mechanics in a way that more accurately would mimic a real game. You will learn about declaring war, annexing countries and how to manage conquered lands. You will also learn about events, stability, rebels and exploration.
translation: 教程的该部分将通过准确的模拟真实游戏的方法来介绍游戏原理。你将学习如何宣战，吞并国家，以及如何管理新征服的土地。你也将了解事件，稳定度，叛乱和探索新世界。

original: this is a desc of the parts
Click to continue to the next page.
Click to go back to the tutorial menu.
Click to skip this chapter and go to the next.
translation: 点击跳过当前章节进入下一章节。

original: Select a Chapter and then press Play.
translation: 选择一个章节然后点击开始。

original: In this chapter you will learn about the very basics of how to play the game. This includes how you control the §Mcamera§! and the §Mgame speed§!.
translation: 玩家在该章节能够学到游戏的基本规则，包括如何调节§M镜头§!和§M游戏速度§!。

original: You can minimize this interface at any time by clicking the §MMinimize§! button. To show it again, simply click the §MMaximize§! button.
translation: 玩家可以随时点击§M最小化§!按钮最小化该界面，点击§M最大化§!重新显示该界面。

original: You can at any time pause the game by pressing the §MSpacebar§! button or by clicking the §MTime Control Interface§!. You can speed up or slow down the game by using the Time Control Interface or pressing the '§M+§!' (plus) button or '§M-§!' (minus) button on your keyboard.
translation: 玩家可以随时按下§M空格键§!或者点击§M时间控制界面§!暂停游戏，通过时间控制界面或者按下键盘上的「§M+§!」（加号）按钮或「§M-§!」（减号）按钮加快和减缓游戏速度。

original: §MUnpause§! the game and wait until the 1st of January to continue.
translation: §M继续§!游戏并等到1月1日以继续。

original: When you pause Europa Universalis IV, you can keep playing by issuing orders and taking control of the situation. In peacetime, you may want to speed up time, while in wartime you may want to slow down or pause the game to give the conflict your full attention.
translation: 暂停《欧陆风云 IV》后，玩家可以继续下达命令，掌控局势。在和平时期，玩家可以加快游戏速度，而在战争时期可以减缓游戏速度或者暂停游戏集中精力处理冲突。

original: You can use your §Mmouse pointer§! to move the camera by moving it to either the top, bottom, left or right sides of the game screen. You can also use the §MArrow Keys§! on your keyboard or do it by holding the mouse §Mscroll wheel§! and moving the mouse. If you click the Minimap in the lower right corner of the screen you will move the camera to that location of the world.
translation: 玩家可以将§M光标§!移至屏幕的上、下、左、右移动镜头。你也可以使用键盘上的§M方向键§!，或是按住§M滚轮§!的同时移动鼠标的方式移动镜头。若玩家点击位于屏幕右下角小地图上的一点，镜头将自动切换到那个地方。

original: Move the camera by using the Arrow Keys or by scrolling with the mouse. Click §MNext§! to continue.
translation: 使用方向键或者滑动鼠标移动镜头，点击§M下一个§!继续。

original: You often need to change your zoom to get a better view of the world and what is going on in other parts of it.\n\n§YYou can zoom out by using the scroll wheel on your mouse or by clicking the §MZoom out§Y button located near the Minimap in the bottom right corner of the screen.§W
translation: 玩家需要经常改变镜头来更好地观察整个世界，掌握地区动向。\n\n§Y使用鼠标滚轮或者点击屏幕右下方小地图旁边的§M拉远镜头§Y按钮。§W

original: To continue you must §MZoom out§! so you can see all of Europe.
translation: 继续§M拉远镜头§!，整个欧洲尽收眼底了。

original: Now that you have zoomed out, try zooming in instead.\n\n§YYou can zoom in by using the scroll wheel on your mouse or by clicking the §MZoom in§Y button located near the Minimap in the bottom right corner of the screen.§W
translation: 现在镜头已经拉远，试试拉近镜头。\n\n§Y玩家可以使用鼠标滚轮或者点击屏幕右下方小地图旁边的§M拉近镜头§Y按钮拉近镜头。§W

original: To continue you must §MZoom in as close as you can§!.

Let us see if you understood how you can use the camera. Try finding a certain province by moving the camera and zooming in or out. Follow the arrow until you find the province. When you find the province, the arrow will snap and point down towards it.
translation: 你是否明白如何控制镜头了呢？移动并放大或缩小镜头寻找某一省份。跟随箭头直到找到指定省份。当你发现省份时，箭头会指向它。

original: Follow the §MArrow§! north and find the province of §MAberdeen§!. Left-click on it to continue.
translation: 跟随§M箭头§!往北寻找§M阿伯丁§!省份，左键单击阿伯丁继续。

original: You have now learned how to control the camera. In the next chapter you learn about controlling armies and fleets.
translation: 你已经学会如何控制镜头，下一章节你将学习如何操作军队和舰队

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节

original: This chapter will focus on §Munit control§! and will also teach you the basics of §Mbattles§! and §Msieges§!.
translation: 本章节重点介绍§M单位操作§!，同时教你§M战斗§!和§M攻城§!的基本规则。

original: Rebels have taken over the province of §MPale§!, you must defeat them! Select the army stationed in the §MLondon§! province by clicking it or by holding the left mouse button and dragging the selection box over the army.
translation: 叛军已经控制了§M佩尔§!，你必须击败他们！点击或者按住鼠标左键框选驻扎在§M伦敦§!的军队。

original: Select the §MRoyal Army§! located in §MLondon§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M伦敦§!的§M皇家陆军§!继续。

original: Now that you have selected the army, right-click on any province to move it there. To get to §MPale§! you first need to go to §MGwynedd§!. Have the army selected and right-click on Gwynedd, then unpause the game so the unit moves there.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.
translation: 现在军队已被选中，右键点击任意省份将部队移向该省。玩家必须经过§M格温内斯§!才能到达§M佩尔§!。选定军队，右键点击格温内斯，然后恢复暂停的游戏让军队移动到那儿。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。
将军队移动到§M格温内斯§!。

original: You will need to transport your army to §MPale§! by boat, click §MAttach to Transport§! button to load the army into the ships at §MGwynedd's§! port. When a transport ship that has units attached to it leaves the harbor, the units will be embarked onto the ships. \n\n§YEach transport ship can only carry 1 regiment of troops.§!
translation: 玩家需要使用船只将军队运到§M佩尔§!，点击§M连接运输工具§!按钮将军队装入§M格温内斯§!港口的船只。当有部队连接的运输船离开港口的时，部队单位会乘上船 。\n\n§Y每艘运输船只能装载一个军队。§!

original: Select your army and click the §MAttach to Transport§! to continue.
translation: 选择你的军队后点击§M连接运输工具§!以继续。

original: Your troops are now attached to the Royal Navy in port Gwynedd. To transport your troops across the Irish Sea you need to select the fleet by clicking on it or by dragging the selection box over it.§W
translation: 玩家部队已经在格温内斯港连接上了皇家海军，点击或框选舰队运送部队穿越爱尔兰海。§W

original: Select the §MRoyal Navy§! located in the §MGwynedd port§!.
translation: 选择§M格温内斯港§!的§M皇家海军§!。

original: To move your fleet, right-click the §MIrish Sea§! sea province. Once your fleet moves out of port the attached units will be embarked on the ships.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§W
translation: 右键点击§M爱尔兰海§!海上省份移动舰队，当舰队离开港口时，连接的单位将会登上船只。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§W

original: Send your fleet to the §MIrish Sea§! sea province to continue.
translation: 派遣舰队到达§M爱尔兰海§!海上省份继续。

original: To disembark your troops, have the fleet selected and then click the §MTransport§! button to select your army.
translation: 选择舰队，然后点击§M运输§!按钮选择军队。

original: Now that your army is selected, right-click on the §MPale§! province where the rebels are to order your troops to disembark.§W
translation: 你已经点选了你的军队，右键点击发生叛乱的§M佩尔§!省份卸载军队。§W

original: Order your army to §MPale§! to continue.
translation: 命令军队前往§M佩尔§!继续。

original: Your army is now fighting the rebels in §MPale§!. When the battle is over you will have to besiege the province because it has been taken over by the rebels. The battle window will appear whenever you have selected an army that is engaged in battle.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 玩家的军队正在§M佩尔§!与叛军战斗，当战斗结束时，玩家需要围攻都柏林，因为它已经被叛军占领。每当战斗中的军队被选中时，战斗窗口就会出现。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§!

original: Unpause the game and §MDefeat the rebels§! to continue.
translation: 解除暂停并§M击败叛军§!继续。

original: You have defeated the rebels on the battlefield, but the city is still under rebel control. Your army is besieging Pale and it will take some time before the defenders will surrender.\n\n§YThe time it takes to perform certain actions, such as sieging, has been reduced in the tutorial. During a regular game things may take longer.§!
translation: 尽管叛军已被消灭，城市仍在叛军控制下。你的军队正在围攻佩尔，距离叛军投降还需要一段时间。\n\n§Y在教程中一些动作花费的时间已被减少，比如围攻，在正常游戏中这些行动花费的时间更长。§!

original: Victory! You have defeated the rebels and recaptured Pale. You have completed Chapter 2 of the tutorial. In the next chapter you will learn about §MProduction§!.
translation: 大获全胜！你已经击败了叛军重新夺回了佩尔，你已经完成了教程的第二章，下一章将会介绍§M生产§!。

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节。

original: The third chapter of the tutorial will focus on basic §Meconomy, §Munit recruitment§! and §Mbuilding construction§!.
translation: 本教程的第三章将重点介绍基础的§M经济，§M单位招募§!和§M建筑修造§!。

original: In this chapter you will learn about §MRecruiting Regiments§!, §MBuilding Ships§! and constructing §MBuildings§!. All production takes place in a province.
translation: 你在本章可以学会如何§M募集军队§!，§M修造船只§!和修建§M建筑§!。所有生产在省份内进行。

original: §MClick London§! on the map to continue.
translation: 在地图上§M点选伦敦§!继续。

original: Each province is different and has different economic or military value depending on such things as §Mbase tax§!, §Mtrade power§!, strategic location or what kind of §Mtrade goods§! they produce. You will learn more about these values later. Provinces are where all unit production takes place. You can §MRecruit Regiments§!, §MBuild Ships§! and §MHire Mercenaries§!.
translation: 每一个省份都不相同，而且由于§M基本税收§!，§M贸易竞争力§!，战略位置或者生产的§M贸易货物§!的不同，每一个省份的经济或军事价值也不尽相同，之后，玩家会了解到更多关于这些价值的信息。所有生产都在省份进行，玩家可以§M募集军队§!，§M修造船只§!和§M招募雇佣兵§!。

original: Armies consist of regiments that can be of three different types: §Minfantry§!, §Mcavalry§! or §Martillery§!. Each regiment has 1,000 soldiers.
translation: 陆军由三种军团组成：§M步兵§!，§M骑兵§!与§M炮兵§!。每一军团皆为1000人。

original: In the Recruit Regiment window you will see a list of all units available for recruitment. Recruiting a regiment will cost you 1,000 §MManpower§! in addition to §Mducats§!. Manpower is an important resource that regenerates over time. Without sufficient Manpower you cannot train new armies or reinforce existing ones. You can see your manpower in the top-left corner of the screen.
translation: 在军队招募窗口玩家可以看到一个列表，列表上显示了所有可招募单位。除§M金币§!外，每招募一个军队还要花费1000§M人力§!。人力是一种重要的资源，会随着时间慢慢恢复。人力不足则无法训练新军队，无法补员现有军队。人力可以在屏幕左上方看到。

original: §MRecruit any regiment§! in London to continue.
translation: 在伦敦§M招募任意一个军队§!继续。

original: You can build ships by selecting a coastal province and clicking the §MBuild Ship§! button. There are four different types of ships: Heavy Ships, Light Ships, Galleys and Transports.\n\n§YClick §MBack§Y to go back to the province view and then click the §MBuild Ship§Y button.§W
translation: 玩家可以选择一个沿海省份并点击§M修造船只§!按钮修造船只。有四种船只可供修造：重型船只，轻型船只，帆船和运输船。\n\n§Y点击§M返回§Y回到省份界面并点击§M修造船只§Y按钮。§W

original: §MBuild any ship§! in London to continue.
translation: 在伦敦§M修造任意船只§!继续

original: Buildings can be constructed to make improvements to provinces. Improvements can vary from increased tax income to more powerful forts to increased trade. Constructing buildings is vital for strengthening your economic and military power.
translation: 修建建筑可以在各方面提升省份，包括增加税收，强化要塞，增加贸易等等，是提升经济和军事实力的必须手段

original: Buildings are categorized in different categories according to their use. Some buildings within the same category will replace others and are marked by yellow arrows while others (such as the university) can be built independently of the others.
translation: 建筑分为多种类型，等级高一些的建筑被称为§M特殊建筑§!，每个省份只能拥有一种类型的特殊建筑.§M独特建筑§!和常规建筑相比能够获得产生更大的收益，但是每一个国家只能拥有一个独特建筑

original: §MConstruct any building§! in London to continue.
translation: 在伦敦§M建造任意建筑§!以继续

original: There are two different queues for production in a province. The unit queue allows you to either §Mbuild a ship§! or §Mrecruit a regiment§!. You can also queue buildings. The building queue allows you to either construct a §Mbuilding§!, §Mmake core§!, §Mconvert religion§! or §Mchange culture§!. Each of the two queues can do one thing simultaneously.
translation: 每个省份的生产分为两个队列——单位队列和建造队列。在单位队列中，你可以 §M建造舰船§!或者§M招募陆军§!。在建造队列中，你可以§M修建本地建筑§!、 §M核心化§!、§M转换宗教§!或者§M转换文化§!。每一个队列同时都只能做一件事。

original: As an empire grows larger it becomes more difficult to manage. The §MProduction Interface§! will help you with constructing larger amounts of buildings or training troops. Selecting a building from the list will update the mapmode with information regarding where you would get the most benefit.\n\n§YCheck the top-left of the screen.§!
translation: 随着一个帝国变得越来越大，管理它变得更加困难。 §M生产界面§! 将帮助您建造更多的建筑物或训练部队。 从列表中选择建筑物将更新地图模式，并提供有关您在哪里能获得最大收益的信息。\n\n§Y请注意屏幕的左上角。§!

original: Click the §MProduction Interface button§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M生产界面按钮§!继续

original: Select a unit from the list and then click on the map to start production. You can either click directly on the map or click the '§M+§!' icons. Clicking a province more than once will queue the ship or unit.\n\n§YStart production in 5 different provinces and then remember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 选择列表上一个单位，然后点击地图开始生产.玩家可以直接在地图上点击或者点击'§M+§!' 图标.多次点击省份会排列船只和单位. \n\n§Y在5个不同省份生产，别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: Select any §MLand unit§! from the list to the left and §MRecruit 5 regiments§! to continue.
translation: 从左方列表选择任意§M陆上单位§!，§M招募 5 个军队§!继续

original: This concludes Chapter 3: Production. In the next Chapter you will learn about §MWar§!.
translation: 第三章：生产结束，下一章将会介绍§M战争§!.

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节

original: This chapter of the tutorial will focus on §MWar§! and §MDiplomacy§!.
translation: 本章将会重点介绍§M战争§!和§M外交§!

original: When you Declare War on a target you want to have a §MCasus Belli§! on them. If you do not have a Casus Belli, or justification for war, you will suffer negative effects from declaring war on them.\n\n§YClick the §MLeinster§Y province, then click §MDiplomacy§Y and select §MDeclare War§Y. Select the Conquest Casus Belli with §MTake Leinster§Y as War Goal and then click §MDeclare War§Y.§W
translation: 玩家希望拥有对宣战目标的§M开战原因§!.若无开战原因或正当的理由，玩家将会受到负面影响\n\n§Y点选§M伦斯特§Y省份，然后点§M外交§Y并选择§M宣战§Y. 以§M占领伦斯特§Y为战争目标选择征服开战原因，然后点击§M宣战§Y.§W

original: Move your troops into the Leinster province to engage their army. You must also besiege and occupy their province before you can continue. If you want to bring all your troops you will have to ferry them over and merge them into one army.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 将军队移动到伦斯特和守军开战.必须围攻并占领该省份才能继续.若玩家想派遣所有的军队，必须将军队从海上运过去，编成军队\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original:
To §MDemand Tribute§! in a peace deal requires you to have a certain amount of §MWar Score§!. The §MWar Goal§! reduces the War Score cost of that province by 50%. Having a claim on a province reduces the cost of Diplomatic Power by 50%.

§YClick the Leinster province, then click §MDiplomacy§Y and select §MSue for Peace§Y.
Remember to unpause the game.§W
translation:
玩家需要获得一定量§M战争得分§!才能在和平协议中§M要求进贡§!。§M战争目标§!可使对目标省份所需的战争得分降低50%。拥有省份宣称权会减少50%外交点数花费。

§Y点击伦斯特，然后点击§M外交§Y，选择§M求和§Y。
别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§W

original: Sign a §Mpeace treaty§! of any kind with Leinster to continue.
translation: 与伦斯特签订任意一项§M和平条约§!继续

original: When a war ends your two nations will have a truce (unless you annexed them, because then they no longer exist). You can see which countries you have a truce with and when they expire by hovering the mouse over the §MTruce Alert§!. Attacking someone who you have a truce with will incur a severe penalty to §MStability§! and is not recommended.
translation: 战争结束后，交战双方会签署停战协议（除非玩家将对方吞并，因为这样做对方国家将不复存在.玩家可以把鼠标放在§M停战提醒§!上查看签署协议对象和协议到期时间. 攻击签署停战协议的对象会大大影响§M安稳度§!，因此不建议这种行为.

original: This concludes the Basic Tutorial for Europa Universalis IV. You can replay the tutorial at any time if you wish to do so. Play the §MAdvanced Game Mechanics§! part or find out more about Europa Universalis IV's features in the §MSpanish Empire Beginner Campaign§!.
translation: 《欧陆风云 IV》的基本教程结束，玩家可以随时重新进入教程.进入§M高级游戏机制§!部分或者进入§M西班牙帝国新手战役§!了解更多游戏内容

original: Click §MExit§! to go back to the tutorial menu.
translation: 点击§M退出§!返回教程菜单

original: This chapter will go through the §Minterface§! and explain what everything is and why it is important.
translation: 本章将介绍 §M主界面§! 并解释每一项是什么，以及它为什么很重要。

original: This chapter will go through the §Minterface§! and explain what the §Minterface§! does.
translation: 本章将会介绍界面的功能

original: Ducats are one of the primary resources and are used to pay for everything from unit recruitment to building constructions.
translation: 金币是游戏中主要资源的一种，用来支付从招募单位到建造建筑的各种费用

original: Manpower is an important resource that puts a limit on how many soldiers your nation can have. The Manpower cap represents 10 years of Manpower. Recruiting a regiment will cost 1000 Manpower per regiment. Reinforcing armies that have taken casualties in war will also drain your Manpower.
translation: 人力是一种重要的资源，决定了国家一共能够招募多少士兵.人力上限为10年人力总和.每招募一个军队需要花费1000人力.替负伤的军队补充军力也会消耗人力

original:
Stability represents how stable your nation is. Stability is connected to §MUnrest§!, §MTax Income§!, §MGlobal Trade Power§! and more.

Stability can be increased in the §MStability and Expansion tab§! and costs §MAdministrative Power§!. Stability can be lost through §Mrandom events§!, §Mbreaking truces§!, changing §MState Religion§! or having your §MRuler§! die in combat.
translation:
稳定度表现了你的国家的稳定程度。稳定度会影响到§M叛乱度§!，§M税收§!，§M全局贸易竞争力§!等。

稳定度可以在§M稳定和扩张§!界面内消耗§M行政点数§!增加。稳定度可能因§M随机事件§!，§M撕毁休战协议§!，改变§M国教§!或者§M统治者§!战死等原因降低。

original: Prestige is gained by winning battles, wars or through random events. Prestige gives your troops §Mincreased Morale§!, §MLegitimacy§! and §MBetter Relations Over Time§!.
translation: 威望可以在战斗，战争中获胜，通过随机事件获得.威望可以使军队§M士气上升§!，提升§M正统度§!，随时间§M提升友好关系§!.

original: Only republics are affected by Republican Tradition and it primarily reduces §MNational Unrest§!. Republican Tradition is lost by keeping the same ruler for several terms and is gained slowly every year. Low Republican Tradition is associated with an increased §MStability Cost§!.\n\nOnly monarchies are affected by Legitimacy and it represents how legitimate the rule of your Monarch is considered. Legitimacy affects §MUnrest§!, §MReligious Tolerance§! and §MDiplomatic Reputation§!.
translation: 只有共和政体国家会受到共和国传统影响，它主要降低§M全国叛乱风险§!。同一个统治者多次连任会降低共和国传统，而共和国传统会每年缓慢的增加。共和国传统过低会增加§M提升稳定度的成本§!。\n\n只有君主制国家会受正统性影响，它表示了你的国君的统治有多么符合正统法理。正统性主要影响§M叛乱度§!、§M宗教容忍度§!和§M外交威望§!。

original: §MPower Projection§! is a value that reflects how good your nation is at flexing its muscles. By selecting §MRivals§! and by taking aggressive actions against them, your Power Projection can increase. Having Power Projection can give you bonuses to your country. Privateering, winning wars, embargoing and support rebels are examples of actions that increase your Power Projection.
translation: §M力量投射§! 是一个衡量你的国家有多么擅于彰显国力的值. 通过选择 §M宿敌§! 并对他们采取侵略性的行动，你的力量投射值就可以增加. 力量投射值会给予你的国家正面影响. 私掠，赢得战争，禁运和支持叛乱等例子都是提升力量投射的方法.

original: Envoys are characters you use to perform different tasks. Merchants are used to collect income from trade and steer trade. Colonists are used to found new colonies. Diplomats are used to perform Diplomatic Actions. Missionaries are used to convert the religion of a province. Envoys will return when they have finished performing their tasks.
translation: 特使可以被用来执行各种任务。商人团可以在贸易中获取收入和引导贸易导向。殖民队可以建立新的殖民地。外交官可以进行外交活动。传教士可以转变省份的宗教信仰。任务完成后特使会返回首都。

original: You have three resources which combined are called §MMonarch Points§!. These are §MAdministrative Power§!, §MDiplomatic Power§! and §MMilitary Power§!. You gain Monarch Points each month, and the amount depends on your Ruler's and your advisors' skills.
translation: 三种资源统称§M君主点数§!。包括§M行政点数§!，§M外交点数§!和§M军事点数§!。玩家每月会获得君主点数，数量由统治者和顾问技能决定。

original: Alerts notify you about information that you might want to do something about. Left-clicking an alert will take you to where you can do something about it, while right-clicking the alert will hide it. Red alerts are urgent, yellow alerts are important and green alerts are non-urgent. The Diplomatic Offers from other countries also appear here.
translation: 提醒信息提示玩家想做的事情的信息，左键点击提醒信息将会切换到相关界面，右键点击隐藏.红色提醒信息为紧急信息，黄色为重要信息，绿色为非重要信息.其它国家的外交提议也在这里显示

original: The Production Interface is designed to help you make production more efficient and easy to use. You can learn more about it in the §MProduction Chapter§! in the §MBasic Tutorial§!.
translation: 生产界面帮助玩家更便捷地进行生产，玩家可以在§M基本教学中§!的§M生产章节§!中了解到更多信息

original: The Holy Roman screen allows you to see which nation is the Holy Roman Emperor, who the Electors are and also view all the member states.
translation: 帝国视图允许玩家查看神圣罗马帝国帝国的组成国家，包括皇帝、选帝侯与所有普通成员。

original: If your state-religion is Catholic, you will have access to the mechanics related to the Papacy. The Papacy view gives you information about Papal Influence and what you can spend it on. Every time the Pope dies, a new one must be chosen from the active cardinals. You may invest Papal Influence to increase the chance of you being the next Curia Controller.
translation: 如果你的国教是天主教，你就会受罗马天主教廷机制影响。教廷界面会显示你拥有的教廷影响力，以及你可以运用它们的方式。每当教宗蒙主恩召，将会在在职的枢机中选择一位新的教宗。你可以花费教廷影响力来提高成为下一任教廷监护的概率。

original: The Outliner helps you by giving you fast information about the progress and statuses of armies, navies, buildings, envoys and more.
translation: 大纲窗口可以提供很多快捷信息，如正在进行的进程、陆军海军状态、建筑情况、特使等内容。

original: Score represents how well your nation is doing and is divided into three categories. The categories are Administrative, Diplomatic and Military. You can view §MScore Comparison§! in the §MLedger§! to see what gives you score.
translation: 得分代表了国家表现的出色程度，一共可分成三种类型.行政、外交和军事.玩家可以在§M总账§!中的§M得分比较§!查看得分点

original: Mapmodes will change the information given to you on the world map. The next chapter will go through them in more detail.
translation: 地图将会改变世界地图上显示的信息.下一章节将会具体介绍地图

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.§W
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节§W

original: This chapter will go through what §Mmapmodes§! are and why they are useful.
translation: 本章将会介绍各种地图以及使用它们的便利之处

original: Mapmodes are a tool to help you better get information about the world you play in. The default mapmode is the §MTerrain Mapmode§!.
translation: 地图地形模式能够帮助玩家更好地了解世界信息。默认地图模式为§M地形地图§!。

original: The Political Mapmode will color all the provinces in different colors, one for each nation. The Political Mapmode can make it easier to see borders and where a nation has provinces around the world.
translation: 政治地图中，所有省份会用不同颜色标出，每一种颜色代表一个国家. 该地图能够让玩家清晰地看出边界和每个国家省份的位置

original: The Trade Mapmode shows you which provinces belong to what Trade Zone. In addition, it also shows you where trade flows and it is here you order your merchants to steer trade in a certain direction. You will learn more about §Mtrade steering§! later.
translation: 贸易地图能够让玩家知道各个省份所属的贸易区.此外能够让玩家知道贸易方向以便玩家调整.之后，玩家会了解到更多§M贸易引导§!的信息

original: The Imperial Mapmode shows which provinces belong to the §MHoly Roman Empire§!. Green provinces are imperial provinces, orange are the Electors and purple is the Emperor. You may notice that one of your provinces (Brescia) belong to the empire, while you as Venice, do not.
translation: 帝国地图能够显示从属于§M神圣罗马帝国§!的省份。深绿色为帝国省份，浅绿色为选帝侯国，亮绿色为帝国.玩家可以发现玩家的一些省份（布雷西亚，维罗纳，弗留利）属于帝国，但威尼斯却不是。

original: The Religious Mapmode shows you the spread of religion around the world. This will make it easy to see which provinces are not of your §Mstate religion§! and where you might find friends or foes.
translation: 宗教地图显示了世界宗教分布.玩家可以清楚地看到那些省份不信仰§M国教§!，哪儿可以找到朋友或敌人

original: The Diplomatic Mapmode gives you information about where your cores are, who your allies are and where your enemies are. The green stripes show you your §Mcore provinces§! that you do not own. Clicking on a province belonging to another nation will update the Diplomatic Mapmode with that nation's information.
translation: 外交地图能够告诉玩家核心省份的位置，谁是友军，谁是敌人。绿色条纹显示玩家未占领的§M核心省份§!。点击从属于其它国家的省份能够更新外交地图下该国的信息。

original: There are many more mapmodes to help you get information about what is going on in the game. Try clicking one of the additional mapmode buttons and have a look.
translation: 游戏中还有其他地图模式，可以帮助你了解游戏中发生了什么。试着点击一个其他地图模式按钮看一看吧！

original: This concludes this chapter. The next chapter will go through §Mtrade§! in more detail.
translation: 本章结束，下一章将更加细致地介绍贸易

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节

original: This chapter will go through the basics of how §Mtrade§! works.
translation: 本章将会介绍贸易的基本规则

original: Trade is an important part of Europa Universalis IV. The world is divided up in different §MTrade Nodes§! with each having a different number of provinces in them. Provinces produce different §Mtrade goods§! and the §MTrade Value§! of those goods is transported to their respective Trade Nodes. Trade Nodes are visible on the map as either floating buoys or cities and they have light blue stripes connecting each other.
translation: 贸易是《欧陆风云 IV》的重要组成部分.整个世界被分成不同的§M贸易节点§!，每一个贸易节点包括不同数量的省份.省份生产不同的§M贸易货物§!，其§M贸易额§!会被运送到各自的贸易节点.贸易节点在地图上可视，用浮标或者城市表示，由蓝色条纹相互连接。

original: A good portion of the Trade Power in a Trade Node comes from provinces and can be improved by building §Mtrade buildings§!. Certain provinces are §MImportant Centers of Trade§! or they have a §MRiver Estuary§!. Both of these give a bonus to Trade Power. Your capital province, Venezia, is an example of a province that is an Important Center of Trade and has a River Estuary.
translation: 贸易竞争力的一大部分来自省份，并且可以由§M贸易建筑§!提升.一些省份或者是§M重要的贸易中心§!，或者拥有§M河口§!. 这些都会对贸易竞争力进行额外加成.玩家的主要省份威尼斯就是一处拥有河口的重要贸易中心

original: The §MTrade Value§! in a Trade Node comes from the §Mprovinces§! that trade there. You can either §Mcollect income§! from the Trade Value or §Msteer the trade§! to the next Trade Node. §MTrade Power§! is a very important value that determines how much of the trade in a Trade Node you control. The more trade you control the more income you can collect or the more Trade Value you can transport forwards.
translation: §M贸易额§!来自在贸易节点进行贸易的§M省份§!.玩家可以从中§M获得收入§!或者§M引导贸易§!到下一贸易节点.§M贸易竞争力§!十分重要，决定了玩家可以在一个贸易节点中控制多少贸易.控制的贸易越多，获得的收入也越多，运往下一站的贸易额也越高

original: Your §MMerchants§! can perform two different actions in a Trade Node. §MCollect from Trade§! requires that you own a province in that Trade Node and will collect income from trade. The amount of §MTrade Power§! you have compared to your competitors determines how many ducats you gain in §MTrade Income§!.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: §M商人团§!在贸易节点能够进行两项行动。§M贸易获利§!需要玩家拥有属于一处贸易节点的省份，商人可以从贸易中获得收入。和竞争对手的§M贸易竞争力§!对比量决定了在§M贸易收入§!中能够获取的金额。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: Have a Merchant §MCollect from Trade§! in the §MVenice Trade Node§! to continue.
translation: 让商人在§M威尼斯贸易节点§!中§M获得利益§!

original: The second action your §MMerchant§! can perform is §MTransfer Trade Power§!. This will transfer §MTrade Value§! from one §MTrade Node§! to another. The amount of §MTrade Power§! you have compared to your competitors determines how much Trade Value is transferred.\n§YSelect the §MAlexandria§Y province and then click the button to go to the Trade Node. Remember to unpause the game.§!
translation: §M商人§!能够执行的第二项行动为§M转移贸易竞争力§!，该行动能够将§M贸易额§!从一个§M贸易节点§!转移到另一个.和竞争对手的§M贸易竞争力§!对比量决定了能够转移多少贸易额\n§Y选择§M亚历山大§Y省份，然后点击按钮前往贸易节点，别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: Go to the §MAlexandria Trade Node§! and have a Merchant §MTransfer Trade Power§! to continue.
translation: 前往§M亚历山大港贸易节点§!，获得商业§M转移贸易竞争力§!继续

original: The Trade Mapmode shows you where the different §MTrade Nodes§! are, which provinces belong to them and also how trade is steered. As you see here, you are now §Msteering trade§! from Alexandria to Venice. Trade can only flow in the direction the arrows are pointing. Some Trade Nodes are so-called §Mend-nodes§!, which means trade cannot be steered away from them. §MVenice§! and §MGenoa§! are two examples of end-nodes. §MTrade Power§! determines how much §MTrade Value§! is transferred from one Trade Node to another.
translation: 贸易地图向你展示了不同的 §M贸易节点§! 的位置，以及分属于这些节点省份和贸易的转移情况. 你可以看到，你正在从亚历山大港向威尼斯 §M转移贸易额§! . 贸易只能按照箭头指向的方向流动到下游. 有些贸易节点被成为 §M终端节点§!,它们并不具有下游节点,无法再向外转移贸易额. §M威尼斯§! 和 §M塞维利亚§! 就是终端节点的两个例子. §M贸易竞争力§! 决定了你拥有多少 §M贸易额§! 可以从一个贸易节点转移到另一个.

original: Trade Power directly affects how large portion of trade in a Trade Node you control. Trade Power comes from §Mprovinces§! and from §MLight Ships§! that are protecting trade. There are also Ideas and a §MDiplomatic Advisor§! that affect §MGlobal Trade Power§!.
translation: 贸易竞争力直接影响玩家控制的贸易节点的贸易规模，取决于§M省份§!和保护贸易的§M轻型船只§!. 此外，§M外交顾问§!能够影响§M全局贸易竞争力§!

original: Select your §Mships§! in port in Venezia.
translation: 选择威尼斯港口的§M船只§!

original: Light ships can be ordered to Protect Trade. This means they will patrol the Trade Node and increase the amount of Trade Power you have in that node. Having your ships Protect Trade is very important for increasing trade income.
translation: 轻型船只可被用来保护贸易.它们会在贸易节点巡逻，提升该节点的贸易竞争力.这对于提升贸易收入至关重要

original: Have your ships §MProtect Trade§! in a Trade Node.
translation: 派遣船只到一处贸易节点§M保护贸易§!

original: The easiest way of increasing your Trade Power is by building more §MLight Ships§! and having them §MProtect Trade§!. Barques that are Protecting Trade increase your Trade Power in that Trade Node by 3.
translation: 修造§M轻型船只§!§M保护贸易§!是提升贸易竞争力最简单的方法.保护贸易节点的三桅帆船能够提升3点该节点的贸易竞争力

original: §YClick the §MProduction Interface§Y in the top-left to continue.
translation: §Y点击左上方的§M生产界面§Y继续

original: Each Barque Protecting Trade in a Trade Node increases the §MTrade Power by 3§!. Higher level Light Ships have a higher Trade Power. \n\n§YSelect §MBarque§Y from the list to the left and click on the green provinces on the map to start building them. Remember to unpause the game.§W
translation: 每一艘在贸易节点保护贸易的三桅帆船提升§M3点贸易竞争力§!. 等级越高的轻型船只拥有的贸易竞争力也越高 \n\n§Y选择左方列表中的§M三桅帆船§Y并点击地图上的绿色省份开始修造.别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§W
修造§M五艘轻型船只 （三桅帆船）§!继续

original: This concludes the end of the Trade chapter of the tutorial. Hopefully you have gained a better grasp of how trade works in Europa Universalis IV.
translation: 贸易教学章节结束，希望玩家已经对《欧陆风云 IV》中的贸易有了更加深刻的了解。

original: Click §MExit§! to go back to the tutorial menu.
translation: 点击§M退出§!返回教程菜单

original: This chapter will go through §Munit production§!, §Mmissions§!, §Mwar§! and §Mconquest§!.
translation: 本章将介绍§M单位生产§!，§M任务§!，§M战争§!和§M征服§!。

original: Army recruitment is an important aspect of going to war. Recruitment progress takes place in a province, but can be started in two ways. Either through the §MProduction Interface§! in the top-left or by clicking the §MRecruit Regiment§! button in a province. Each regiment costs 1000 Manpower.
translation: 军队招募是进行战争的一个重要环节。招募在省份内进行，可使用两种方式。玩家即可以通过左上方的§M生产界面§!，也在省份内点击§M招募军队§!按钮，每一次招募一个军队需要花费 1000 人力。

original: §YClick the §MProduction Interface§Y in the top-left to continue.
translation: §Y点击左上方的§M生产界面§Y继续

original: Select a regiment from the list to the left and click the green provinces to start recruitment. Each regiment costs 1000 Manpower as well as ducats.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 在左方列表上选择一个军队，然后点击绿色省份进行招募.每招募一个军队需要花费1000人力和一定的金币\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: Missions are a way to set goals for your country. Missions can vary in difficulty and in terms of rewards. You can only have one mission at a time and canceling a mission will mean you will have to wait 5 years until you can choose a new one.\n\n§YClick the §MNo mission selected alert§! to go to the §Decisions§! tab.§W
translation: 任务是为你的国家设定目标的一种方式。任务在难度和奖励方面会有所不同。你只能完成一次任务，取消任务意味着你必须要再等待5年才能选取新的任务。\n\n§YClick the §MNo mission selected alert§! to go to the §Decisions§! tab.§W

original: Select the mission '§MFinish the Reconquista§!' to continue.
translation: 选择任务「§M完成收复失地运动§!」 继续

original: When you Declare War on a target you want to have a §MCasus Belli§! on them. If you do not have a Casus Belli, or justification for war, you will suffer negative effects from declaring war on them.\n\n§YRight-click the §MGranada§Y province and select §MDeclare War§Y. Select the Conquest Casus Belli with §MTake Granada§Y as §MWar Goal§Y and then click §MDeclare War§Y.§W
translation: 玩家希望拥有对宣战目标的§M开战原因§!.若无开战原因或正当的理由，玩家将会受到负面影响\n\n§Y点选§M伦斯特§Y省份，然后点§M外交§Y并选择§M宣战§Y. 以§M占领格拉纳达§Y为战争目标选择征服开战原因，然后点击§M宣战§Y.§W

original: The War Overview window gives you an overview of how the war is going, who the belligerents are and who is the war leader of each side. Battles and sieges are listed in the bottom.
translation: 战争概览窗口能告诉玩家战争的进行过程，交战的双方以及双方的首领.战役和攻城显示在下方

original: The results of the war will be recorded and are presented as §MWar Score§!. War Score is gained by occupying enemy provinces and by winning land or naval battles. If an enemy occupies your provinces or defeats you in battle, you will instead lose War Score. War Score decides what can be demanded in a §MPeace Offer§!.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 战争的结果会被记录，并会用§M战争得分§!记录. 占领敌方省份，在陆战和海战中获胜都能获得战争得分.相反，领土被敌方占领以及在战斗中被击败都会失去战争得分.战争得分决定了§M和平建议§!中能够要求什么\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: Have a §MWar Score§! of 100% to continue.

Granada is defeated! Annex them to finish the reconquest of Spain.\n\n§YRight-click the §Mwar overview§Y shield at the bottom-right. Select their only province to demand their annexation and then click §MSend Demand§!. Remember to unpause the game.§W
translation: 已击败格拉纳达！吞并它，完成西班牙的收复失地运动。.\n\n§Y右击右下角的§M战争概览§Y盾牌。选中敌人仅剩的省份，然后点击§M发送要求§!。记得取消游戏暂停。§W

original: Demand Granada's last Province to continue.
translation: 索取格拉纳达剩余全部省份，然后继续。

original: This concludes the Reconquista Chapter of the Spanish Empire Campaign.
translation: 西班牙帝国战役复国运动章节结束

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节

original: This chapter will go through §MMonarch Points§!, the §MRuler§!, §MAdvisors§!, §MCore provinces§!, §MReligion§! and more.
translation: 本章将会介绍§M君主点数§!，§M统治者§!，§M顾问§!，§M核心省份§!，§M宗教§!等。

original: The Ruler is very important for the development of your country. You have three resources which combined are called §MMonarch Points§!. These are §MAdministrative Power§!, §MDiplomatic Power§! and §MMilitary Power§!. You gain Monarch Points each month, and the amount depends on your Monarch's skills and your advisors.
translation: 统治者对国家的发展至关重要。玩家拥有三种资源统称为§M君主点数§!，分别为§M行政点数§!，§M外交点数§!和§M军事点数§!。每月获得的君主点数数量取决与君主技能和顾问。

original: Advisors boost how many §MMonarch Points§! you gain each month. They cost gold to hire and you also pay them salaries each month. Hiring a more expensive advisor will give you more monthly Monarch Points, but you will gain less gold each month.\n\n§YClick the §MYou have a free Advisor Slot alert§! to go to the §MCourt§! tab.§W
translation: 你每个月都会得到顾问给你增加的§M君主点数§!。用金币雇佣他们，同时每个月将会发给他们工资。雇佣更贵的顾问将会得到更多的君主点数，但你每个月会得到更少的金币。\n\n§Y点击§M你有一个空闲的顾问槽§!以进入§M政府§!界面查看。§W
打开§M宫廷界面§! 来继续

original: Advisors boost how many §MMonarch Points§! you gain each month. They cost gold to hire and you also pay them salaries each month. Hiring a more expensive advisor will give you more monthly Monarch Points, but you will gain less gold each month.\n\n§YClick the empty portraits to go to the list of available advisors.§W
translation: 顾问能够增加玩家每月获得的§M君主点数§!. 玩家需要花费黄金招募顾问，每月还要发给顾问一定工资.雇佣的顾问越昂贵，君主点数的增加量也越大，但是每月获得黄金就会变少\n\n§Y点击空白肖像前往可雇佣顾问列表§W

original: Core provinces are provinces that your nation considers their home lands. It is important to make provinces into cores to avoid §MOverextension§!. A province that is not a core province has significantly reduced §Mtax income§! and §Mmanpower§!. Having a §Mclaim§! on a recently conquered province will reduce the cost and time it takes to make it a core.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 核心省份是玩家视为国家领土内的省份.将省份变为核心省份防止§M过度扩张§!非常重要，因为非核心省份的§M税收§!和§M人力§!都会大大降低. 拥有最近征服的省份的§M宣称权§!能够减少变成核心省份花费的时间\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!
将格拉纳达§M变成核心省份§!继续

original: Maintaining Religious Unity is important for keeping your nation stable and rebel-free. To have Religious Unity you must convert provinces to your state religion. Converting the religion of a province requires a Missionary. Conversion progress can be improved by high Stability. \n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 宗教统一可以使国家稳定，防止发生叛乱。玩家必须使省份宗教皈依国教才能拥有宗教统一。而转换宗教需要传教士的帮助。高稳定度能够提升转教速度 。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏§!

original: §MConvert§! the province of Granada to continue.

Buildings are an important part of improving your nation's economy and military strength. Most buildings can be built in all provinces, but they are limited by the number of §Mbuilding plots§! in a province.  All buildings cost ducats to build.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 建筑物是提升国家经济和军事实力的重要部分。绝大多数建筑物可以在所有省份建造，但数量受限于该省份的§M建筑栏位§!。建造建筑物都会花费金币。\n\n§Y记得取消游戏暂停。§!

original: Construct a §MChurch§! in Granada to continue.
translation: 在格拉纳达建造一座§M寺庙§!继续

original: Events occur randomly as you play. They often give you a choice between two or more options where the purpose is to add dynamics and flavour to the game. There are also nation-specific events for certain countries that add flavor and historical context.
translation: 事件会在游戏过程中随机出现，目的在于增加游戏的趣味性.玩家需要在两个或更多选项中做出选择.游戏中也会出现国家的特定事件

original: Click the button in the event pop-up to continue.
translation: 点击事件中出现的选项继续

original: There are many different types of rebels, each faction with a different agenda. The §MUnrest§! in a province determines the likelihood of a revolt happening. You can either choose to §Mdefeat the rebels§! in battle or negotiate with them in the §MStability and Expansion§! tab.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 叛乱的种类有许多种，每一个派别都有不同的诉求.一个省份的 §M叛乱度§! 显示了爆发叛乱的可能性. 你既可以在战斗中 §M剿灭叛乱§! 也可以在 §M稳定和扩张§! 界面中向他们妥协.\n\n§Y别忘记结束暂停,继续游戏.§!

original: Stability represents how stable your nation is. Stability is connected to §MUnrest§!, §MTax Income§!, §MGlobal Trade Power§! and more. Stability can be increased in the §MStability and Expansion tab§! and costs §MAdministrative Power§!. \n\n§YClick the shield in the top-left, then click the §MStability and Expansion§Y tab and then under Stability click §MBoost§!.
translation: 稳定度表现了你的国家的稳定程度. 稳定度会影响到 §M叛乱度§!，§M税收§!，§M全局贸易竞争力§! 等等.稳定度可以在 §M稳定和扩张§! 界面内消耗 §M 行政点数 §! 增加. \n\n§Y点击左上角的盾徽，然后点击 §M稳定和扩张§Y 界面然后在稳定度一栏下点击 §M提升§!.

original:
Royal Marriages are a way to form a bond between your nation and another nation.

§YWith no units selected, right-click a province in §MPortugal§! to open up Diplomacy with them. Click the §MDynastic actions§! accordion to show the §MRoyal Marriage§! option.

Remember to unpause the game.§W
translation:
王室联姻是与其它国家建立良好关系的一种手段

§Y在没有选定任何单位的情况下，右键点击§M葡萄牙§!进行外交。点击§M王室§!选项打开§M王室联姻§!选择项。

别忘了继续已暂停的游戏。§W

original: Enter a §MRoyal Marriage with Portugal§! to continue.

Having Royal Marriages increases your §MLegitimacy§! over time, but will give you a one-time reduction of Legitimacy that depends on the difference in §MPrestige§! and §MLegitimacy§! of the two countries. Having a Royal Marriage with another nation gives you a chance of merging your §Mdynasties§! and possibly entering a §MPersonal Union§!.
translation: 王室联姻能随时间提升玩家的§M正统性§!，但是会根据两国间的§M威望§!和§M正统性§!的差别降低一定的正统性。和其它国家进行王室联姻能够提升玩家兼并对方§M家族§!的几率，并形成§M联合统治§!。

original: Decisions allow you to reform your nation in some way. If the requirements are fulfilled you can enact the Decision and immediately gain the effects of the Decision. Some Decisions can be large undertakings, such as forming Germany or Italy.\n\n§YClick the §MNational Decision Available alert§! to go to the §MDecisions tab§Y.§W
translation: 决议让你能够对你的国家进行改革。当条件满足时，决议可以立刻生效并让你获得决议的加成。一些决议的条件会非常苛刻，比如成立德国或意大利。\n\n§Y点击 §M决议可用提醒§! 进入 §M决议窗口§Y.§W
点击§M外交成立西班牙§!以继续

original: Technology can be unlocked by spending §MMonarch Points§!. Technology is divided into §Mthree categories§! and each category is associated with one of the three Monarch Points.§!
translation: 科技可以通过花费§M君主点数§!解锁. 科技可分为§M三种类型§!，每一种类型和一种君主点数相关§!

original: Being ahead in Technology will give you a penalty to Technology costs. It is a good idea to plan Technology and Ideas so that the ones you want do not require the same Monarch Points. It is also good to plan in accordance with your Ruler's abilities.
translation: 科技超前将会对你的科技花费造成额外惩罚。合理安排科技和理念以便于更合理的使用君主点数，根据你的统治者的能力来协调安排也是个不错的选择。
解锁§M贵族共和制（7）§!以继续

original:
The Monarch Point cost to aquire technologies is modified by the §MInstitutions§! you have embraced. At the start of the game the only unlocked §MInstitution§! is §MFeudalism§!, which starts out §MEmbraced§! by all countries in Europe and most in Asia.

Every 50 years a new §MInstitution§! is born in a province somewhere in the world and it will then slowly spread to the rest of the world from that point.

In order to §MEmbrace§! an §MInstitution§! it needs to have spread to at least 10% of your provinces. Once a new Institution is born every country that has not yet §MEmbraced§! it will get a slowly increasing penalty to Technology costs. What §MInstitutions§! exist and how they have spread can be examined by clicking the §MInstitutions§! button in the Technology tab.
translation:
获得科技所需要的君主点数由你已接受的§M思潮§! 所修正。在游戏的开始，唯一解锁的§M思潮§!是§M封建主义§!，封建主义最开始被整个欧洲和大部分亚洲国家所§M接纳§! 。

每50年都会有一个新的§M思潮§!在世界上的某一个省份出现并慢慢从它的起源地向全世界传播。

想要 §M接纳§! 一个 §M思潮§!，这个思潮需要至少传播到你所控制省份的10%。每一个还没有§M接纳§! 新思潮的国家都会受到一个随时间慢慢增加的科研惩罚。可以在科技栏的§M思潮§!按钮中检视现存的§M思潮§!和他们的传播情况。

original: Idea Groups can be chosen at specific intervals depending on your §MAdministrative Technology§!. The technology you just researched unlocked your second Idea Group. Idea groups are a way of specializing your country and to make it more unique and stronger at performing certain tasks.
translation: 在特定级别的§M行政科技§!解锁后，你会获得一个理念组栏位。你刚刚解锁的科技帮助你获得了第二个理念组栏位。理念组是帮助你的国家更加专门化的扮演好某一职责的良方。

original: Unlocking an Idea in an Idea Group costs §M400 Monarch Points§! of either §MAdministrative§!, §MDiplomatic§! or §MMilitary Power§!. Which Monarch Points are used depends on the Idea Group. It is a good idea to choose an Idea Group that uses Monarch Points of the type you have plenty of.\n\n§YClick the §MFree Slot§! button and then select the §MExploration Ideas§!.§W
translation: 解锁一理念组需要付出§M400行政§!、§M外交§! 或§M军事§!之§M君主点数§!.而所需之君主点数的种类，则随理念组而异.根据你库存充裕的君主点来选择理念组，才是明智的抉择.\n\n§Y请按一下§M空白的理念槽§! 再按§M探索理念§!.§W

original: Select the §MExploration§! Idea Group to continue.
translation: 选择§M探索§!理念组以继续

original: Unlocking 3 Ideas will also unlock 1 of your §MNational Ideas§!. Most of the larger nations, and some of the smaller ones, have special National Ideas. \n\n§MQuest for the New World§Y is an Idea in the §MExploration§Y Idea Group that allows you to recruit §MExplorers§Y & §MConquistadors§Y. It requires you to first unlock the §MColonial Ventures§Y idea.
translation: 解锁3个理念也会解锁1个你的§M国家理念§!。多数大国和一些小国都拥有独特的国家理念。\n\n§M探索新世界§Y在§M探索§Y理念组中，该理念允许你可以招募§M探险家§Y和§M征服者§Y。该理念的前提为解锁§M开拓殖民地§Y理念。

original: Unlock the §MQuest for the New World§! idea to continue.
translation: 解锁§M探索新世界§!理念以继续。

original: This concludes the Spanish Inquisition Chapter of the Spanish Empire Campaign.
translation: 西班牙帝国战役西班牙宗教裁判所之章至此结束

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to next chapter.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节

original: This chapter will teach you about §Mexploration§! and §Mcolonization§!.
translation: 该章将会指导你学习探索与殖民

original: Exploration and Colonization is an important part in Europa Universalis IV. Discovering new lands and founding new settlements is a relatively peaceful way of expanding your Empire.
translation: 探索和殖民是《欧陆风云 IV》的重头戏。探索新大陆、建立殖民地是一个相对和平的帝国扩张方式。

original: Uncharted lands are hidden by §MTerra Incognita§!. You will need an §MExplorer§! or a §MConquistador§! in order to move into Terra Incognita. To recruit Explorers or Conquistadors you need to first have unlocked the §MQuest for the New World§! idea.
translation: 未知之地被标识为§M未知省份§!。你需要一位§M探险家§!或者§M征服者§!来进入未知省份。招募探险家或征服者需要§M探索新世界§!理念。

original: Select your fleet in §MAndalucia§! to continue.
translation: 选中你位于§M安达卢西亚§!的舰队以继续

original:
Explorers lead fleets while Conquistadors lead land armies. Your fleet is lead by Christopher Columbus who is an Explorer.

§YOrder your ships into §MTerra Incognita§Y by right-clicking the area.

Remember to unpause the game.§!
translation:
探险家指挥海军，征服者指挥陆军。目前你的舰队在探险家克里斯托弗·哥伦布的指挥之下。

§Y使用右键点击§M未知区域§Y将舰队移动过去。

记得要取消游戏暂停§!

original: Have your fleet sail west and §Mfollow the Arrow§! to continue.§W
translation: 将你的舰队驶向西方，并且§M沿着箭头指示§!以继续§W

original: Exploration can be dangerous because of attrition. Whenever your ships are at sea and too for away for supply ships to reach them, they will suffer attrition damage. In a normal game you would have to explore more slowly, taking your ships back for repairs whenever necessary. For the tutorial, however, naval attrition is severely reduced.
translation: 由于损耗，探索可能会充满危险.当你的船队远航难以获得补给时，他们就会损耗.在正常的游戏中，你不得不缓慢的探索，并在必要时召回船队重整旗鼓.不过在教学中，我们把损耗降至很低

original: Have your fleet sail west and §Mfollow the Arrow§! to continue.§W
translation: 将你的舰队驶向西方，并且§M沿着箭头指示§!以继续§W

original: Uncolonized land can be settled by sending a §MColonist§! there. How far away you may found a colony depends on your §MColonial Range§!. Uncolonized land can have a population of §Mnatives§! in them, which may be worth taking into account. Natives with high aggressiveness are more likely to attack your colony.
translation: 派遣一位§M殖民者§!便可在未殖民土地上定居。你最远能在哪里建立殖民地取决于你的§M殖民距离§!。未殖民土地上可能会有一定数量的§M原住民§!，他们也应获得重视。原住民敌意越高就越有可能攻击你的殖民地。

original: Colonies can be founded by nations that have access to §MColonists§!. Colonists are primarily gained by the §MExploration§! and §MExpansion§! Idea Groups. When a Colonist is sent to an uncolonized province he first has to travel there. Once he has arrived he will begin constructing a settlement.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 在已派遣§M殖民者§!的地方可以建立殖民地。殖民者主要通过§M探索§!和§M扩张§!理念组获得。在殖民者抵达一个未殖民的省份时才能进行下一步。一旦他抵达后就会开始建立殖民地。\n\n§Y记得要取消游戏暂停§!

original: Once settled, a colony will take some time to grow before it becomes self-sufficient. The amount of new Settlers in the colony will increase each month and it needs 1000 Settlers to become self-sufficient. Having a Colonist present will increase the growth of Settler population.
translation: 在开始殖民之后，殖民地需要经历一段时间才能自给自足.殖民地中的殖民者数量会每月自动增加，在达到1000后即可.在殖民地上有殖民者能够加速殖民者数量的增加

original: Well done! This concludes the New World chapter of the Spanish Empire Campaign and also marks the end of tutorial. You now hopefully grasp the basic tools to get you started with Europa Universalis IV!\n\n§YWe recommend that you make good use of the hint-system once you start playing a regular game.§!
translation: 干得好！西班牙帝国战役的新世纪章完成了，教学也到此为止。你已经掌握了畅玩《欧陆风云 IV》所需要的基础技术！\n\n§Y善用提示系统会在游戏时给你更多帮助。§!

original: §MDisabled during this part of the Tutorial.§!

Heavy Ships are large warships that excel in combat. Light Ships are faster ships that are mainly used to protect your trade, but are also useful for exploration. Galleys are cheaper warships that should be used in inland seas. Lastly there are also transport ships to ferry your troops over water.§W
translation: 重型战舰是在战斗中表现出色的大型军舰。轻型战舰是一种速度更快的船，主要用于保护贸易，但也有用于探索。桨帆战舰是一种价格低廉的军舰，用于内海作战。最后还有运输船，可以在水上运送你的部队。§W
